amendment.description: To promote the use of cellulosic biomass ethanol derived from agricultural residue.

vote.text: Amendment SA 854 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 854 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 850. (consideration: CR S7421-7423, S7444; text: CR S7421) To promote the use of cellulosic biomass ethanol derived from agricultural residue.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 854 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 854 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 850.
